Which market segments look particularly over-or undervalued today? Morningstar's director of personal finance Christine Benz will discuss how that top-down view translates into specific ideas for stocks, mutual funds, and exchange-traded funds. She'll also share considerations that should be top of mind for investors in the realm of tax-and financial planning.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]
You will learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" col_shadow_hover="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]What If This Turns Out to Be a Terrible Time to Retire?[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Low bond yields and elevated equity valuations suggest that new retirees are confronting a challenging environment. This presentation discusses some of these headwinds and shares strategies for troubleshooting them at the portfolio and financial plan levels. Christine will also discuss Morningstar's recent research on safe withdrawal rates. [/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22The%20implications%20of%20low%20bond%20yields%20and%20not-inexpensive%20equity%20valuations%20for%20retirees'%20asset%20allocations%20and%20withdrawal%20rates%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20retirees%20can%20defend%20against%20%5C%22sequence%20of%20return%20risk%5C%22%20and%20inflation%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20retirees%20can%20confront%20other%20potential%20risk%20factors%20to%20their%20retirement%20plans%2C%20including%20high%20long-term%20care%20costs%22%7D%5D" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

SKIRBALL/WEBINAR ACCESS INFORMATION

NON ANNUAL PASS HOLDERS CAN PREPAY $15 FOR THE SKIRBALL MEETING OR PAY $18 AT THE DOOR, OR PAY $15 FOR THE WEBINAR.
THIS PURCHASE SITE WILL CLOSE ON FRIDAY, March 18, AT 6 PM.
CLICK HERE TO PREPAY FOR THIS SKIRBALL OR WEBINAR MEETING ONLY
 
Note: (1) All Annual Pass Holders will receive the registration link to each Webinar event by email as soon as the local AAII Chapter receives the link.  (2) A Webinar registration link for this event will be emailed to payees on two dates: March 11 in the early evening, and March 18 after this purchase site closes at 6 pm; (2) Annual pass holders will receive a "name tag pass" at the Skirball Cultural Center at each of the 5 Skirball meetings next year, and will also receive an email with the registration link for all 10 Webinar meetings.  You will have the choice of viewing the Webinar on screen or attending the Skirball Center in person. Your annual pass gives you access to Skirball or the Webinar for each of the five combo Skirball/Webinar events.
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1639077484345{background-color: #b5ffb6 !important;}"][/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
